llvmlibc-inline-function-decl.description:
Description

Checks that all implicitly and explicitly inline functions in header files are
tagged with the
LIBC_INLINE
macro, except for functions implicit to classes
or deleted functions.
See the
libc style guide
for more
information about this macro.
llvmlibc-inline-function-decl.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
